=== Declaration ===
<tt>#include <pgm/snmp.h></tt>

<tt>int '''pgm_snmp_shutdown''' (void);</tt>

=== Purpose ===
Stop and destroy a running SNMP agent or master agent.

=== Return Value ===
On success, 0 is returned.
